2010-12-01

Winter / December playlist

I asked iTunes to randomly pick a playlist from all the songs with December in the title - as that left it picking randomly from four tracks I broadened the search with "winter" - here's what it picked:

  • Winter - Into Paradise
  • Winterlong - The Pixies
  • Winter Wonderland - Aimee Mann
  • Winter Winds - Fotheringay

  • The Cold Swedish Winter - Jens Lekman
  • December - Teenage Fanclub
  • Winter Wonderland - Darlene Love

  • Flowers in December - Mazzy Star
  • Winter Blue - Heather Nova
  • In Winter Still - Dot Allison
  • Always Winter - Tompaulin
  • Winter Killing - Stina Nordenstam
  • Winterlong - Lee Ranaldo
  • Winter Driving - The Pastels
  • Winter is Sharp - Kathryn Williams

  • Summer Babe (Winter version) - Pavement
  • Wintermitts - Julie Doiron
  • Winter is Blue - Vashti Bunyan

  • Winter - Kristin Hersh
  • Autumn and Winter - David Cain
  • Winter Song - Nico
  • December Will Be Magic Again
  • Winter 2 - The Fall
  • Strawberries Are Growing in My Garden (And It's Wintertime) - Lida Husik
